1.name: bStream
1.text: I completed an internship at an outsourcing company. My tasks included fixing bugs in an online store based on osCommerce and developing features for the company's internal CRM system using the Laravel 5 framework. I finished the work due to the company's closure.

2.name: World of Mattresses
2.text: I worked as a PHP developer in a company engaged in online sales. My responsibilities included developing an administrative panel for a new website using the Laravel framework, transferring functionality from the old site to OpenCart, designing the database, and handling other related tasks.

3.name: Usilok
3.text: I worked at the online store "Usilok." My responsibilities included creating a website on OpenCart 3, parsing products using OpenCart extensions, running Google Ads campaigns, and generating feeds. Currently, I handle website maintenance, bug fixing, and adding new products.

text.about_me: I was born on January 26, 1996, in Ukraine. I graduated from Ternopil National Economic University with a degree in Computer Information Technologies. I am interested in sports, poker, programming, and music. I am married, have a child, and currently live with my family in Hamburg, Germany.

legal.text_3: As a private website owner, I am responsible for my own content on these pages. Content of external links is checked only when used; liability for third-party content is excluded.
legal.text_4: This is a private blog without commercial purposes.
